surname Ju

sentences.english: You hurt my feelings by betraying me when I'm in trouble.
sentences.chinese: 你太傷我感情了，居然在我身陷困境之時背叛了我。

sentences.english: However, soon after that, she has a relapse of breast cancer.
sentences.chinese: 但是不久，滴發現她的乳癌居然復發。

sentences.english: It' really surprises me that Xiao gives me an ticket of Olympic.
sentences.chinese: 確實比較驚喜，老肖居然送我一張奧運門票。

sentences.english: One cannot imagine mere human beings concocting such dreadful things, and one can scarcely imagine human beings bearing life in them.
sentences.chinese: 更令人想不到的是，居然還有人類在其中繁衍生息。

sentences.english: You insult the Queen of Burgund in public with these lies?
sentences.chinese: 你居然在大庭廣衆下用這種謊言侮辱勃艮的皇后？

sentences.english: I had no idea of thescale of things until I went over last year to give readings.
sentences.chinese: 我直到去年去做讀書會才知道居然賣了那麼多。

sentences.english: We choose to go to the moon and other things, not because they are easy, but because they are hard.
sentences.chinese: 好容易翻完這麼長這麼專業的東西居然沒人認領？

sentences.english: Have not missed Chen Shi to her gushed is to have a cordiality, incredibly wanted to cry in doctor for her.
sentences.chinese: 沒曾想沈氏對她倒是頗有情意，居然要爲她去請大夫。

sentences.english: After a really short explanation, the staff member who came up began to leave.
sentences.chinese: 終於上來的員工居然在超快超倉促的解釋後就要走。

sentences.english: One only knows how bloody men, even, for you to tears.
sentences.chinese: 一個是隻懂流血的男人，居然，爲你流了淚。

sentences.english: You may think it strange that anyone would live there.
sentences.chinese: 你也許感到奇怪，居然有人願意住在那兒。

sentences.english: Ichoate time , I Actually foolish foolish go believe you.
sentences.chinese: 剛開始的時候，我居然儍傻去相信禰。

sentences.english: Eyes a bright, incredibly have force monk is having a competition?
sentences.chinese: 眼睛一亮，居然有武修士在比試？

sentences.english: Late returns, people find, sammo hung the dwellings of lamp incredibly still on.
sentences.chinese: 深夜返回時，大家發現，洪金寶住處的燈居然還亮着。

sentences.english: Yang Hong interrogated in light of this that Manager Hao said unexpectedly looked Yang Hong does not look like the ordinary consumer.
sentences.chinese: 楊鴻就此質問，郝經理居然說看楊鴻不像普通消費者。

sentences.english: Wah dares to offend Our Majesty.
sentences.chinese: 華太師居然敢得罪我們皇爺。

definition: unexpectedly/to one's surprise/in spite of everything/in that crazy way/actually/to go as far as to
didn't expect
unexpectedly/actually/to go so far as to/indeed
indeed/truly/(coll.) (used to express disapproval, annoyance etc about sth)
really/sure enough/as expected/if indeed

no wonder!/so that's why!
